SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the clockwise direction from Ad Impression Rate ?
SRP.A: The next dimension clockwise from Ad Impression Rate  is Sponsorship Revenue Ratio

SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the counterclockwise direction from Sponsorship Revenue Ratio ?
SRP.A: The next dimension counterclockwise from Ad Impression Rate  is Ticket Sales Rate .

SRP.Q: On the TV/Streaming Viewership Rating , is the point for evolve real-time deliverables inside or outside the point for re-intermediate cross-media e-tailers?
SRP.A: On the TV/Streaming Viewership Rating , the point for evolve real-time deliverables is inside the point for re-intermediate cross-media e-tailers.

VPR.Q: Which label encloses the largest score in the radar chart?
VPR.A: label {Sponsorship Revenue Ratio } encloses the largest score

VPR.Q: What are the strongest and weakest dimension of evolve real-time deliverables?
VPR.A: The strongest aspect is {Sponsorship Revenue Ratio }, while the weakest aspect is{ Live Comment Engagement Rate }.

VPR.Q: On dimension Ad Impression Rate , which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On Ad Impression Rate , label {re-intermediate cross-media e-tailers} scores the highest.

VPR.Q: On dimension Ticket Sales Rate , which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On Ticket Sales Rate , label {re-intermediate cross-media e-tailers} scores the lowest.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value of label evolve real-time deliverables across all dimensions in the radar chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value of label re-intermediate cross-media e-tailers across all dimensions in the radar chart?

NC.Q: For evolve real-time deliverables, which dimension has a higher score: Ad Impression Rate  or Live Comment Engagement Rate ?

NC.Q: On Ad Impression Rate , which label has a higher score: evolve real-time deliverables or the re-intermediate cross-media e-tailers?

NC.Q: For evolve real-time deliverables, which dimension has a higher score: TV/Streaming Viewership Rating  or Box Office ROI  or User Retention Rate ?

MSR.Q: For evolve real-time deliverables, based on the data shown in the radar chart, which dimension does it most need to improve?
MSR.A: evolve real-time deliverables most needs to improve its {Live Comment Engagement Rate }.

MSR.Q: In the radar chart, which label has the strongest overall capability across all labels?
